attributes.action: sack both Allan Leighton and Adam Crozier
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: terminate the contract of employment of both Allan Leighton, as Royal Mail Group Chairman, and Adam Crozier, as chief executive of the Royal Mail, if they have not entered into meaningful negotiations with the Communication Workers Union regarding their Business plan, staff reduction and to resolve the current pay dispute. These negotiations should commence no later than one month from the opening of this petition. should either Allan Leighton or Adam Crozier refuse to enter into meaningful negotiations their contracts shall be terminated with immediate effect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
